text:
Vancouver & Victoria, BC, Canada | ONSITE | Full-Time | Go2mobi - http://go2mobi.com

We build advertising technologies that media buyers love. We're a tight-knit, hard working crew that are looking for Software Engineers and Data Scientists to research, build and improve our mobile advertising real-time bidding technology. We're using Go (Golang), RabbitMQ & Apache Spark to solve tough architectural and scaling challenges on services that handle over 500k requests per second.

If this sounds interesting to you, check out our job postings at http://www.go2mobi.com/careers and send your cover letter, resume and anything else you feel that exemplifies you as an engineer to careers@go2mobi.com
